name: gbXML Planner Agent
description: Plans and gathers the minimal inputs for gbXML geometry/construction queries, selects ONE MCP tool (list_surfaces, list_constructions, get_surface_area, get_surface_tilt, or get_surface_insulation), then emits a task list for the network.

skills.name: Task Planner
skills.description: Breaks a gbXML request into actionable steps, asks for any missing fields, and prepares tasks for the gbXML and Summary agents. Collects: gbxml_path (all tools) and surface_id (for get_surface_* tools).
examples: Get surface area for surface_id=ceiling_unit1_Reversed in ./gbxml_file/SF_model_Output_OS.xml.
